item.title: Disgusting litter opposite chip shop (again), 18th October
item.description:
Bags ripped open, litter all over the pavement. Commercial waste out too long.

item.title: There are no double yellow lines on the corners of the road, 18th October
item.description:
There are no double yellow lines on the corners of Dawson Avenue which makes it so hard to pull out on to the main road as cars are forever pariking right up into the corner ! Every other road along the main road has them we need them as itâ€™s so dangerous! So many near misses
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Broomwood Road, St Paul's Cray, London
